roleset.name: taking a count of a population

example.name: Light verb: do
example.text: It is possible to do a census of a large population , as with the United States Census , but it requires a huge amount of work , rime , and money .

propbank.arg: as with the United States Census

example.name: Light verb: take
example.text: If Ford Motor Corporation wished to take a census of past purchasers ' reactions to the company 's recalls of defective models , the researchers would have to contact millions of automobile buyers .

propbank.arg: of past purchasers ' reactions to the company 's recalls of defective models

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: 45.20 shows the number of marked iguanas that Wikelski and his team counted in their census of study populations just before the spill and about a year later .

roleset.note: CENSUS-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WN eventive noun lexicon. No VNcls. (from census.01-n)
